io.atomix.storage.journal

Interface JournalWriter<E>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DelegatingJournalWriter, JournalSegmentWriter, RaftLogWriter, SegmentedJournalWriter

    public interface JournalWriter<E>
extends AutoCloseable
    Log writer.
    Author:
